form: Music has always been a significant part of my life, and I cherish the time I spend engaging with it during my free time. Firstly, I find great joy in playing musical instruments. The piano and guitar are my instruments of choice, and I love immersing myself in their melodic possibilities. Recently, I've been exploring different genres and styles, experimenting with improvisation and composing my own music. It's a creative outlet that allows me to express myself and connect with my emotions on a deeper level.
